_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Wine Generic
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Squad is a realism-based military tactical first-person shooter video game developed and published by Canadian indie developer Offworld Industries exclusively through the Steam distribution platform. It is a spiritual successor to the Project Reality modification for Battlefield 2.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# This script installs the Squad game server using Wine and SteamCMD, as well as creates a start.sh script.

# Navigate to the temporary directory and setup SteamCMD
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd

# Create a directory to prevent SteamCMD disk write errors
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# Install the Squad server for Windows using SteamCMD
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 403240 validate +quit

# Remove the Steam workshop file to prevent conflict with mods specified in the variables tab
rm /mnt/server/steamapps/workshop/appworkshop_393380.acf

# Address ownership issues which can cause SteamCMD to fail, especially when running as root
chown -R root:root /mnt

# Set the HOME environment variable to the server directory
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Download specified workshop items using a list from the `WORKSHOP_ITEMS` environment variable
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous \
$(IFS=','; for item in $WORKSHOP_ITEMS; do echo "+workshop_download_item 393380 ${item}"; done) \
+quit

# Move downloaded mods to the appropriate directory
mv -f /mnt/server/steamapps/workshop/content/393380/* /mnt/server/SquadGame/Plugins/Mods/

# Create or Download 'start.sh' in the server directory
echo "Creating start.sh script in the server directory..."
cat << 'EOF' > /mnt/server/start.sh
#!/bin/bash
# Startup command to run the Squad game server and tail logs.

# Ensure the server executable variable is replaced correctly
SERVER_EXEC="/home/container/SquadGame/Binaries/Win64/${SERVER_EXECUTABLE}"
LOG_PATH="/home/container/SquadGame/Saved/Logs/SquadGame.log"

# Output startup details
echo "Starting the Squad game server..."
echo "Executable: $SERVER_EXEC"
echo "Logs will be tailed from: $LOG_PATH"

# Start the Squad server in the background
wine "$SERVER_EXEC" Port=${SERVER_PORT} QueryPort=${QUERY_PORT} beaconport=${BEACON_PORT} FIXEDMAXTICKRATE=${FIXEDMAXTICKRATE} -log &

# Tail the log file
tail -f "$LOG_PATH"
EOF

chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh

# Inform user of installation completion
echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation and script setup completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: sub directory to install into
variables.description:
for example is the server needs to get installed into /home/container/server/bin/

use server/bin/

variables.name: Download Workshops Items
variables.description:
Workshop file ids separated by a comma "," (1111111,222222) 
Reinstall Required to install mods

variables.name: Beacon Port
variables.description: Beacon port for your Squad server.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Sets the maximum number of players.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The name for the server in the server list

variables.name: Allowteamchange
variables.description: Allow players to change teams ( true \/ false )

variables.name: TKAutoKick
variables.description: teamkill system if you like enable by ( true \/ false )
